scripts.build_all_but_image: cd ../deid && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm manage.spec && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm processor.spec && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm initialize_admin_password.spec && cd ../electron && rm -rf assets/dist && cp ../deid/home/settings.json assets && cp -r ../deid/dist assets && electron-packager . iCore --platform=$(node -p "process.platform") --arch=$(node -p "process.arch") --icon=assets/icon.icns --overwrite
scripts.build: cd ../ && docker image rm -f icore_processor || true && docker build . --platform=linux/amd64 --tag icore_processor && cd electron && docker save -o assets/icore_processor.tar icore_processor && cd ../deid && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm manage.spec && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm processor.spec && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm initialize_admin_password.spec && cd ../electron && rm -rf assets/dist && cp ../deid/home/settings.json assets && cp -r ../deid/dist assets && electron-packager . iCore --platform=$(node -p "process.platform") --arch=$(node -p "process.arch") --icon=assets/icon.icns --overwrite
